name: Nitro Digital
tagline: Bridging the gap to healthier lives
description:
Nitro Digital is an award-winning digital healthcare consultancy that specialises in solving healthcare problems with digital and technology solutions. Leading with a research and insight-driven approach which works towards meeting your objectives that deliver real health outcomes for patients. 
We specialise in healthcare. Cutting edge work includes examples with Boehringer Ingelheim, Bayer, Roche, Sanofi-Aventis, Diabetes UK and MSD 
We work hard to build long-term working relationships with our clients, their agencies and our partners. We fully understand the challenges faced by brand, marketing and communications managers in the rapidly evolving digital space and deliver services tailored to our clients’ needs.
